title: sbyrne's biography
sbyrne's articles
sentences: I am interested in surface processes on planetary bodies throughout the solar system, especially those processes that affect, or are driven by, planetary ices.
I enjoy working with a diverse group of graduate students and postdocs.

Our areas of activity include Martian ice stability, polar stratigraphy and connection to past climates; Ceres ice, both cryovolcanic and as a source of water vapor; and ice-sublimation landforms on a variety of bodies.
